amendment.description: An amendment numbered 55 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph at the end of the bill requiring a plan to consult with Tribal governments and other government officials to be included in the plan required by paragraph (1).
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a new paragraph at the end of the bill requiring a plan to consult with Tribal governments and other government officials to be included in the plan required by paragraph (1).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 52).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 219 (Roll no. 52).
